cards.title: Arctyx
incapacitatedAbilities: Reduce damage dealt by a target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Increase damage dealt by a target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Icy Shell
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other Frost cards in play.
Arctyx is immune to Cold damage.
At the end of your turn, Arctyx regains 1 HP.

cards.title: Ice Coating
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other Frost cards in play.
When Arctyx deals a target Melee damage, he may deal that target 1 Cold damage.
When Arctyx deals a target Cold damage, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Flame Guard
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other Flame cards in play.
Arctyx is immune to Fire damage.
The first time Arctyx is dealt damage by a non-hero target each turn, Arctyx deals that target 2 Fire damage.

cards.title: Burning Trail
body: When this card enters play, destroy any other Flame cards in play.
When Arctyx deals a target Melee damage, he may deal that target 1 Fire damage.
When Arctyx deals a target Fire damage, increase damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Dragon Hide
cards.body: Reduce damage dealt to Arctyx by 1.

cards.title: Aura Lace
cards.body: While there is an Aura in play, whenever {Arctyx} is dealt damage by a target, increase the next damage dealt to that target by {Arctyx} by 1.
cards.powers: Discard 2 cards. Search your deck or trash for an Aura and put it into play. Shuffle your trash into your deck.

cards.title: Armor Burst
body: Destroy all Auras in your play area.
Choose Fire or Cold. {Arctyx} deals up to X targets 3 damage of that type each.
Until the start of your next turn, increase damage dealt to {Arctyx} by X.
X on this card is the number of Auras destroyed this way.

cards.title: Battle Roar
cards.body: Until the start of your next turn, redirect damage dealt by villain targets to Arctyx.

cards.title: Focused Recovery
body: {Arctyx} regains 3 HP.
You may discard any number of Aura cards from your hand. Draw X cards, where X s the number of cards discarded this way.

cards.title: Shifting Auras
body: Each time a Flame card is destroyed this turn, {Arctyx} deals a target 1 Fire damage.
Each time a Frost card is destroyed this turn, {Arctyx} deals a target 1 Cold damage.
You may put any number of Aura cards from your hand into play.

cards.title: Taunt The Newcomers
cards.body: Whenever a non-hero target enters play, {Arctyx} may deal that target 1 Sonic damage.

cards.title: Opportune Lunge
body: {Arctyx} deals a target 2 Melee damage.
You may play a card now.
